metadata.notes: Travel benefit templates including trip protection, baggage, rental exclusions, and emergency assistance

chase-premium.name: Chase Premium Trip Protection
coveredReasons: Sickness, injury, or death of you, a traveling companion, or family member
Traffic accident en route to departure
exclusions: Pre-existing medical conditions (unless premium waiver applies)
Change of plans or fear of traveling
Financial default of travel supplier (unless specific conditions met)
Government travel warnings issued before booking

chase-standard.name: Chase Standard Trip Protection
coveredReasons: Sickness, injury, or death of you, a traveling companion, or family member
exclusions: Change of plans or fear of traveling

amex-premium.name: Amex Premium Trip Protection
coveredReasons: Sickness, injury, or death of you, a traveling companion, or immediate family member
Severe weather causing complete cessation of travel services
Strike causing complete cessation of travel services
exclusions: Changes in plans or financial circumstances

amex-standard.name: Amex Standard Trip Protection
coveredReasons: Sickness, injury, or death of you or traveling companion

chase-premium.name: Chase Premium Baggage Protection
coverageDetails: Covers essential purchases if bags are delayed 6+ hours
Reimbursement for lost, damaged, or stolen checked baggage
Coverage for personal items in baggage
exclusions: Contact lenses, eyeglasses, or hearing aids

chase-standard.name: Chase Standard Baggage Protection
coverageDetails: Covers essential purchases if bags are delayed 6+ hours
Reimbursement for lost or damaged checked baggage

amex-premium.name: Amex Premium Baggage Protection
coverageDetails: Coverage for reasonable, necessary, and essential items
Coverage for entire immediate family traveling with you

amex-standard.name: Amex Standard Baggage Protection
coverageDetails: Coverage for reasonable, necessary, and essential items

chase.name: Chase Rental Car Exclusions
whatsCovered: Collision damage to the rental vehicle
Loss-of-use charges from the rental company
Reasonable towing charges to the nearest repair facility
Valid administrative/surcharges from the rental company
whatsNotCovered: Liability for injuries to any person
Liability for damage to other vehicles or property
Damage while driving under the influence
Damage from racing or speed contests
Wear and tear, gradual deterioration, or mechanical breakdown
Damage from acts of war or nuclear hazards
Loss of personal items or cash
vehicleExclusions: Antique vehicles (over 20 years old or not manufactured for 10+ years)
Vans designed to carry more than 8 passengers
Exotic or luxury vehicles (Ferrari, Lamborghini, Porsche, etc.)
chase.countryNotes: Coverage applies in most countries but is excluded in these specific locations. Always verify with your card issuer before renting.

amex.name: Amex Rental Car Exclusions
whatsCovered: Collision damage to the rental vehicle
Towing to the nearest qualified repair facility
whatsNotCovered: Liability for bodily injury or property damage to third parties
Personal effects or belongings in the vehicle
Damage while vehicle is operated by an unauthorized driver
Damage from participating in any racing activity
Pre-existing damage to the rental vehicle
Administrative, diminution of value, or loss-of-use charges (may have limits)
Tire damage (unless caused by a covered accident)
vehicleExclusions: Motorcycles, mopeds, or motorbikes of any kind
amex.countryNotes: Coverage generally available worldwide where American Express is accepted, but always confirm with your card issuer.

premium.name: Premium Emergency Assistance
services: Emergency medical evacuation to nearest adequate facility
Return of minor children if you're hospitalized
coverageDetails: Available 24/7 when traveling 100+ miles from home
Covers you and immediate family members
exclusions: Travel to countries under travel warnings

standard.name: Standard Emergency Assistance
coverageDetails: Available when traveling 100+ miles from home

chase-sapphire-reserve.name: Chase Sapphire Reserve Travel Perks
otherPerks: Global Entry or TSA PreCheck fee credit ($100 every 4 years)
Trip delay reimbursement up to $500 per ticket
1:1 point transfer to airline and hotel partners
50% more value on travel through Chase Ultimate Rewards

amex-platinum.name: Amex Platinum Travel Perks
otherPerks: Global Entry or TSA PreCheck fee credit ($100 every 4 years)
Fine Hotels + Resorts and The Hotel Collection benefits
Car rental elite status (Avis, Hertz, National)

amex-gold.name: Amex Gold Travel Perks
otherPerks: 3X points on flights booked directly with airlines

amex-delta-reserve.name: Delta Reserve Travel Perks
loungeAccess: Centurion Lounges (when flying Delta same day)
otherPerks: Global Entry or TSA PreCheck fee credit
First checked bag free on Delta flights
